front.title: RSVP-TE Recovery Extension for data plane initiated reversion, protection timer and SNC options signalling

abstract.t: RSVP-TE recovery extensions are specified in [RFC4872] and [RFC4873]. Currently recovery signalling does not support the request for revertive protection, recovery timers values, and sub-network connection (SNC) protection options. This document extends the PROTECTION Object format allowing sub-TLVs, and defines three sub-TLVs to carry wait-to-restore and hold-off intervals and SNC protection options.
